short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click to open all of your favorite pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're like me, you open up Chrome and have a few different websites that you check right away (or frequently throughout the day).  With Easy Open Favs, you can set up a predetermined set of URLs and open them all with one click.  Super easy to stay up on your Facebook, Twitter, Engadget, XDA, etc.  I hope you enjoy making life just a little bit easier!
